message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early!

I'm willing to compromise. Let's meet in the middle!
You're still offering me a raw deal. I'm not backing down!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal. Don't expect it to last!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not getting any more generous!
I'm not getting any more desperate, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. This is my final offer!
You're trying to trick me with your 'final offer', but I'm not falling for it!
I'm not trying to trick you, I'm just trying to get a fair deal. Let's split it 50/50!
